title: `BigNumber Error: times() not a number: null` if open 1:1 chat with special content. Can't use this chat
body:
### Description [comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug) *Type*: Bug [comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below) *Summary*: For some chats: If open 1:1 chat then error popup `BigNumber Error: times() not a number: null` is shown. If close it then white screen is shown. Same happens if relaunch the app, so user can't open 1:1 chat. Can reproduce 2 out of 3 attempts when 1:1 chat contains send and request commands. See steps for details. So for particular 1:1 chat error happens always but I'm still looking for exact steps to get such error for other 1:1 chats. ``` 00:20 4/Status: 2018-06-18 12:25:54.348 [info][tid:com.facebook.react.JavaScript] PRETTY PRINTED EXCEPTION *** NAME: "BigNumber Error" MESSAGE: BigNumber Error: times() not a number: null This error is located at: in message-content-command-request in reagent80 in RCTView in reagent73 in RCTView in RCTView in RCTView in RCTView in reagent70 in message-content in RCTView in RCTView in TouchableHighlight in reagent16 in RCTView in reagent69 in message-row in RCTView in t in RCTScrollContentView in RCTScrollView in ScrollView in t in t in reagent22 in messages-view in reagent68 in RCTView in n in TouchableWithoutFeedback in reagent67 in with-activity-indicator in reagent53 in messages-view-animation in reagent44 in RCTView in RCTScrollContentView in RCTScrollView in ScrollView in chat in enqueueForceUpdate@/var/containers/Bundle/Application/BFE7CE9A-7F8E-4347-9940-36E5B3333A7F/StatusIm.app/main.jsbundle:234:30993 forceUpdate@/var/containers/Bundle/Application/BFE7CE9A-7F8E-4347-9940-36E5B3333A7F/StatusIm.app/main.jsbundle:195:1315 run_queue@/var/containers/Bundle/Application/BFE7CE9A-7F8E-4347-9940-36E5B3333A7F/StatusIm.app/main.jsbundle:12:2280856 flush_queues@/var/containers/Bundle/Application/B ``` #### Expected behavior [comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.) Can see content of 1:1 chat and send/recieve new messages #### Actual behavior [comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.) Error ### Reproduction [comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.) - Install status on iOS and Android device. Set ropsten network, get test eth from faucet. - As Android: open test Dapp and request STT - As iOS device: add Android to contacts and send "ok" text - As Android: Add iOS to contacts in new 1:1 chat and send "fine" text - As Android: send request 0.004 ETH - As iOS: tap on request and send 0.004 ETH - As Android: send 500 STT to iOS from Wallet - As Android: send 0.00088888 ETH to iOS from Wallet - As iOS: send 3 emojis - As iOS: send request 3 ETH - As iOS: send 0.0007 ETH - As Android: send text "ok" - As iOS: wait for all tx to be confirmed, close app, launch app, open 1:1 chat with Android TF session from iOS when issue happens: from 00:19 https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803590-status/builds/8496218/sessions/4394273809/?accessToken=bWbl4fpYxKr/prbLfc7ha5GJxcE This how 1:1 chat looks on Android side: ![chat1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6584810/41531915-519f6516-72f5-11e8-9024-435e1874e2f2.png) ![chat2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6584810/41531922-56ea125a-72f5-11e8-9a34-70acf147de46.png) TX history on Android side (green box is all tx with iOS device) ![tx history android](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6584810/41531944-652a21a2-72f5-11e8-8fbe-f270a06ac010.png) TX history on iOS side ![tx history ios](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6584810/41531960-6f59544a-72f5-11e8-919f-2b7ee49fc843.jpg) ### Additional Information [comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.) * Status version: can reproduce on PR build https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/4786 * Operating System: iOS, didn't try on Android
TestFairy: Status 0.9.20 (6061) @2018

also can reproduce:
1. send 0 eth from android to ios in 1x1 chat
2. send 0 eth from ios to android in same 1x1 chat

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/41536336-ffd485ea-730d-11e8-989a-f6dacac82823.png)

as well as same error with big number - just request something from android to ios
